newsitem.title: UK: UK biotech Prolifix placement raises 5.4 mln stg.
newsitem.headline: UK biotech Prolifix placement raises 5.4 mln stg.

text.p: British based biotechnology company Prolifix Ltd said on Monday it had completed a 5.4 million stg private placement.

In a statement the company said the funding had been led by Atlas Venture and supported by existing investors, Japan's Chugai Pharmaceutical Co Ltd and Britain's 3I Group Plc, as well as Belgian investment company GIMV.
The company said the funds would be used to create a full-time management team and enlarge its laboratories, which will move from London to Oxford.
Prolifix is developing drugs based on small molecules which would affect the cycle of cells in the body. Its current targets are cancer, cardiovascular diseases, viral infections and psoriasis.
